text: New Nigerian was a Nigerian newspaper based in Kaduna. == Political allegiance == The newspaper was allegedly to be a linked with the Kaduna Mafia, a loose group of Nigerian businessmen, civil servants, intellectuals and military officers from Northern Nigeria. == Editors == * Adamu Ciroma - 1966 to 1974 * Mamman Daura - 1969 to 1973 == See also == * List of Nigerian newspapers == References == Category:Publications established in 2011 Category:Mass media companies of Nigeria Category:Newspapers published in Abuja Category:2011 establishments in Nigeria Category:Daily newspapers published in Nigeria Category:Online newspapers published in Nigeria
title: New Nigerian
